aboutMeDesc: I'm a passionate developer with expertise in modern web technologies. I love creating intuitive user experiences and solving complex problems with elegant solutions.
featuredDesc: Here are some of my recent projects that showcase my skills and expertise.
webDevDesc: Building responsive, performant websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript and modern frameworks.

mobileDesc: Ensuring your website looks and works perfectly on all devices from desktop to mobile.
